transcript:
Customer: Namaskar sir.
Executive: Namaskar Namaskar sir.
Customer: Kaise hain sir?
Executive: Badhiya badhiya.
Executive: Ha ji sir aapne call kiya tha but sir main another call pe tha to main pick kar nahi paya. Aapne direct pe customer care pe kar diya us pe kyun kar rahe ho call?
Customer: Actually mein aapka number mere paas tha nahi save nahi tha na to hum jaane pe kaun sa number se aap phone kar rahe the.
Executive: Achcha achcha achcha achcha achcha. Baki koi problem to nahi sir?
Customer: Problem ye hai ki order vagarah samajh nahi pa rahe kaise aaye kaise handle kare us din itna fast aap bata gaye ki dobara hum to bhula gaye kaise kya karna tha.
Executive: Achcha to main aapko fir se guidance de du koi problem nahi hai sir dekhiye kyunki isme work kya kya hai na IndiaMART aapka matchmaking hai sir. To aapka jo aap bylead consume karenge ya fir jo koi inquiry aayegi jo call aayegi aapko usse aapka customer ke customer ka basically aapka coordination hoga sir. Uske baad fir aapke end pe work rehta hai sir aap kis tarike se customers ko baat karoge and convert karoge.
Customer: Correct.
Executive: Nahi to abhi abhi dekhiye cup syrup ka order aaya cup syrup ka wo aaya hai.
Customer: Kya hai?
Customer: Cup syrup ke liye aaya tha.
Executive: Haan. To lead jo aayi thi wo cup syrup ka aaya tha.
Customer: Haan. 150 1500 pieces ka. To baat kari aapne?
Customer: Humne baat nahi ki to humne kaha pehle aapse confirm kare kaise kya karna hai.
Executive: Nahi sir usme jaise aapne koi lead aayi aapko jo aapko lage ki achchi hai lead jisse aap baat karna chahte hain to usko kya karoge aap usko consume karoge consume karke lead manager pe aapke paas information aa jayegi us lead ki. Na to basically lead ki information kya aayegi customer ki information aa jayegi aur customer kya requirement hai wo lead pe mention hoga to aap call karke unse bologe sir aapne main just example de raha hu aap aap bhi add kar sakte ho isme ki sir aapne IndiaMART pe ye check kiya tha iski aapko requirement thi aapne jo hai na bylead generate kari thi. To aap price kya rahega sir ya fir aap direct fir bol sakte hain ki sir hamare paas hum mere paas ye product available hai aisa aisa is product hai hum is tarike se serve karte hain aise karke fir aap product ki detail batana shuru kar dijiyega customer bata dega ki ha sir requirement hai ya customer bata dega ki sir meri requirement puri ho gayi hai jo bhi hoga fir customer uske according baat karega.
Executive: To jis tarike se bhi baat hogi jaise agar aapki baat ho jati hai deal ok hoti hai wo bolta hai ki aisa karo mere ko product ki information bhej do ya product ka mujhe catalog bhej do to aap lead manager se aap bhej sakte ho ya fir aap link share karke apne catalog ka link share karke unko whatsapp pe share kar sakte ho sir product ka aap information dijiyega to ye sare step jo jo aap kaam offline mein karte ho na sir ki aap product ke bare mein batate ho product ka catalog batate ho hai na catalog aapke paas kuch to tayar hoga ki aisa aisa saman hai hamare paas ye sari cheeze hoti hai na sir hamare paas to aap wo dikhate ho offline mein jaise aap koi agar aapka kisi se deal bani hai to tab aap dikhate honge correct sir ki hum ye bhi sell karte hain ye bhi sell karte hain to isi tarike se aapko online mein bhi karna hai sir bas online mein fark ye aa jata hai ki online mein aapko all over India se ya fir aas paas ke jo aap jahan se consume kar rahe ho waha ke sare log dekhte hain to jinse bhi aap baat karoge unse aap baat karke jis tarike se aap offline mein aap client se baat karte ho unko convert karne ki koshish karte ho.
Customer: Are wo to ek alag baat ho gayi hum hum online process mein kaise kaam karenge?
Executive: Matlab wo jaise waha jaise hamare paas mail aaya hai message aaya hai.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Ki ha 15 1500 file hume chahiye.
Customer: Haan. To 1500 file ke liye fir aap agla process mein kya karu uske andar?
Executive: 1500 file main samjha nahi.
Customer: 1500 pieces isko unko chahiye.
Executive: 1500 pieces?
Customer: Are jaise kisi kisi ne jo hai lead generate ki aur mere paas message aaya mail par aaya ya hamare jo hai notification aaya notification aa gaya ki ye ye is jagah se 1500 jo hai file ya jo hai kiski requirement hai.
Executive: Kuch bhi. Theek hai samajh gaya. To ab ab aage hum kya proceed kare usko?
Customer: Ab wo cheez mere paas hai.
Executive: Haan jaise aapke paas hai sir to aap kya karoge ab aap karoge customer ko call. Customer ko call karo aur unko bolo sir aapne IndiaMART pe aap check kar rahe the is product ke liye aur iske liye aapne bylead generate kari thi main dekh raha tha sir 1500 1500 1300 aapne ki requirement is product ki ye product hamare paas available hai ya fir agar ye product nahi hai to is tarike ka similar product mere paas available hai jisme sir ye ye feature hai file jaise aap bata rahe ho file example de raha hu to ye file ka jo jaise a4 size ka file hoti hai hai na to is tarike ki file hamare paas available hai sir aise karke aur fir aap product ki information denge sir hum achche price mein de sakte hain price ki aap baat karke dekh lijiye ki sir matlab udhar unhe koi aur price to nahi mil raha hai un aap puchh lo ki sir kisi se aur se baat hui aapko koi aur price mila hai nahi mila hai to sir hamara price ye hai aapko kitna jaise aap de rahe ho 10 mein aap provide kar sakte ho theek hai to aapne baat kari sir hum 10 mein aapko hum de sakte hain sir aur baki transport ka charges rahega wo rahega to 10 mein hum de sakte hain transport ke charge jaise man ke chaliye 100 aur hoga to 1500 iske liye aapka 10000 mein ya 20000 mein hum aapko aapko with transport hum aapko provide kar sakte hain correct is tarike se aap baat karenge sir wahi main keh raha hu ki baat jaise karni hai like offline sir bas ye fark ho jayega aap mobile pe baat kar rahe hoge baki aap product ke bare mein sari jankari unko do bataiyega sir IndiaMART se aapne search kar rahe the aapko requirement aapne bylead pe generate kari hai udhar se maine aapko call kar raha hu.
Customer: Achcha theek hai hum baat karke dekhte hain lekin ek din aap hame samay dijiye mujhe fir se laptop pe baithaiye aur ek baar fir se dekhte hain kaise kya karna hai lekin processing mein dheere dheere aaram se hum sab note down karenge note.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai to mujhe samay bataiye aap kab available ho jayenge main us samay fix kar deta hu.
Customer: Ab hum ab hum monday tuesday mein available ho payenge is samay marriage mein is samay hai vyast sir.
Executive: Achcha. Achcha. Theek hai to main aapko fir monday tuesday mein call karta hu sir theek hai sir subah 9:00 se sham ke 6:00 baje ke beech mein aap mere ko time rakhiyega matlab apne paas time available kara lijiyega.
Customer: Subah 9:00 baje se sham ke 6:00 baje ke beech mein. Are aapki aapki samasya ko samjhenge hum.
Executive: Haan. And sir aapne call kiya tha to sir jo hai hamare end pe na ticket raise ho jati hai to wo main ticket close kar du number to aapke paas aa hi chuka hai mera.
Customer: Ye helpline number hai?
Executive: Haan yahi mera number hai jab aapne call kiye na.
Customer: Haan. Number number ek baar confirm kara dijiye aap number ek baar padh lijiye mujhe bata dijiye.
Executive: Are wo to wo to wo to call mein aa hi gaya hai.
Executive: Nahi ek baar jisse ki confirm ho jaye mere paas ki ha aapke paas sahi number hai wo ek baar isliye bol raha hu.
Customer: Isme hai 80481662363.
Executive: Nahi sir aap number note down kare ye ye jo number rahega na mera main jo aapko number bata raha hu wo mera whatsapp number bhi rahega.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Haan to wo whatsapp number mein aapke liye faydemand rahega ki aap hamesha aapko wo rahega maloom rahega na aap whatsapp pe bhi mujhse fir baat kar paoge.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai. Likh lijiye number mera.
Executive: Haan bataiye.
Executive: Sir number hai 79
Customer: Ek minute. 79
Executive: 820
Customer: 820
Executive: 22
Customer: 22
Executive: 736
Customer: 736. 7982
Executive: 79820 22736
Executive: Kis naam se save kar le aapka hum?
Executive: Sir mera naam hai Sarthak.
Customer: Sarthak. Haan Sarthak Sharma.
Customer: Okay. Haan ji. Rehne wale kahan ke hain aap?
Executive: Sir agar main mera ghar ki baat karu to mera ghar to Jhansi ka hai UP.
Customer: Hmm. Hmm. Aur waise abhi main kaam to Noida mein kar raha hu sir.
Customer: Noida mein head office hai na?
Executive: Achcha. Haan. Jhansi kab aate hain?
Executive: Matlab sir Jhansi mein Jhansi mein sir matlab festival mein hi jyadatar ab to hota hai sir aana jana.
Customer: Achcha.
Customer: Baki agar koi chutti kabhi mil jati hai to chale jate hain sir. Ye aapka individual number hai kya ye?
Executive: Haan haan sir mera whatsapp number hai main bata deta hu.
Customer: Achcha. To aap ispe direct call karo aapke mere se hi baat hogi.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai sir to main wo ticket close kar de raha hu theek hai sir aapke paas feedback aayega to sir feedback yes de dijiyega please.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai. Okay thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Needs guidance on handling orders.

Resolution:

- Executive explained the order handling process.

- Executive provided his WhatsApp number.

Next Steps: 

- Executive will call on Monday/Tuesday.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- order handling, buyleads, whatsapp number, follow up
